title: Only option for ranked was flex.
body: I got into the  client and the only option for ranked that showed up when i clicked play, was the flex queue. Did i click something wrong? Also, it said it was going to have me play a few games to reset my rank, and my season 6 ranked is still there. Thanks for any answers.

replies.body:
Flex queue is a replacement for Dynamic, but works fairly similarly. Solo queue hasn't been launched yet but is coming soon. Ranked Season 6 is over now, so your ranking is resetting. You can check out [this rundown](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/how-rank-2017-season) on the entirety of Ranked in 2017 for more details.

Let me know if you have any questions.
If we play flex right now though, is it going to soft reset when solo/duo queue does as well, or is this ranked going to continue to be the same even after the soft reset?
Yes, a soft reset will occur prior to the new ranked season officially starting.
